SED1520

SED1520 based vk5121 panel

The SED1520 uses different timing commands, and control pins than the KS0108 and the most common panels have fewer pixels. The distribution contains a generic manual configuration file named Modvk5121_Manual_Config.h for the VK5121 panel.

Note:
Manual configuration files are different from auto configuration files in that they do not auto configure based on board or processor type.
